full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Bay Oxide Arsenic Filter
Tender Number: PW-_HAL-419-11592
Revision 2
Electronic Tendering Method: CPC Connect
#### Mandatory Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-_HAL-419-11592
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W6899-230095/A
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-17T13:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-11-10

#### Procurement Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites suppliers to submit a bid for the supply of Bay Oxide Arsenic Filter media, subject to the terms and conditions outlined in this tender. The tender is made available electronically through CPC Connect.

#### Objective

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires 310 cubic foot boxes of Bay Oxide E33 arsenic removal media filter for delivering to 5 hanger Plumbing shop, 14 Wing Greenwood, Nova Scotia.

#### Deadline and Terms

* **Contract Period**: The contract period will commence upon the contract date and end on 31 March 2023, inclusive.
* **Mandatory Delivery Date**: All deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023.
* **Selection Method**: A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation to be considered responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

#### Tender Submission

Bidders are required to submit their proposals to the public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Bid Receiving Unit by the closing date and time indicated above. To participate and submit files electronically, bidders should refer to Part 3 of the solicitation document entitled Offer Preparation Instructions.

#### Additional Information

For questions or clarification on the tender, bidders should submit a request to the Contracting Authority: Matthew Furlong, Email: matthew.furlong@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca or Fax: (902) 495-5016. Bidders must comply with the terms and conditions of the tender, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Please see the attachments for complete information and additional requirements.

### Associated Attachments

* Various attachments, including technical specifications, bid submissions and related documents.
